patthana17.18:4.1: Kusalaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.18:4.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana17.18:5.1: Kusalaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.18:5.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana17.18:6.1: Kusalaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.18:6.3: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
